name: Jayant Patel
tagline: Building efficient eyes for edge devices.
bioHtml: I am a PhD Candidate in Computer Science at the University of Washington, advised by Prof. Jane Doe. My research focuses on Computer Vision and Model Compression, specifically designing efficient YOLO architectures that maintain high accuracy on resource-constrained edge devices. Previously, I was a Research Intern at NVIDIA AI Lab.
